## GiftMessage interface

Contains the text of a gift message, its sender, and recipient

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GiftMessage 
```

|  [message](./magento-api.giftmessage.message.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | Gift message text |
|  [to](./magento-api.giftmessage.to.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | Recipient name |
